item.title: 5 CSS Tips and Tricks Every Web Developer Should Know
item.description:
Let’s explore some essential CSS tips and tricks that will help you streamline your web design process and build stunning, creative websites.

CSS Clip-Path

Clip path allows you to create custom shapes by clipping the visible area of an HTML element. You can think of it as a virtual pair of scissors that allows you to cut and reshape your items. By manipulating this property, you can create various shapes and effects that go beyond the typical rectangles and squares.

item.title: Next.js 14 Auth with Iron Session and Server Actions
item.description:
Authentication and authorization are crucial for any app to stay secure and work properly. Even the slightest oversight can lead to significant problems.

When it comes to Next.js, Auth.js is a popular choice for handling authentication. However, its documentation is overly complex, often leaving developers puzzled. It’s maintained by a small team, struggles with the challenges of upkeep and maintenance. They haven’t yet migrated the old next-auth library to auth.js and the compatible version with the new Next.js features is still in beta.
